title: Fetterman Makes Reference to a Steelers Legend in Resurfaced Ad
description: Puzzled responses on Twitter to an homage to “Mean” Joe Greene offered Fetterman supporters a chance to mock Dr. Mehmet Oz, his Republican opponent in the Pennsylvania Senate race.
dc:creator: Trip Gabriel

media:content.media:description: LaRita Wilson, 65, next to John Fetterman’s merchandise truck outside a senior center in Upper Darby, Pa., on Friday.
